TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MotionEventButtonState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the , and members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MotionEventButtonState Back = int32(8)

summary.para: Button constant: Back button pressed (mouse back button).
The system may send a key press to the application when this button is pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MotionEventButtonState Forward = int32(16)

summary.para: Button constant: Forward button pressed (mouse forward button).
The system may send a key press to the application when this button is pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MotionEventButtonState Primary = int32(1)

summary.para:
Button constant: Primary button (left mouse button).
This button constant is not set in response to simple touches with a finger or stylus tip. The user must actually push a button.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MotionEventButtonState Secondary = int32(2)

summary.para: Button constant: Secondary button (right mouse button, stylus first button).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.MotionEventButtonState Tertiary = int32(4)

summary.para: Button constant: Tertiary button (middle mouse button, stylus second button).
